sent.orig: PCS: Involving order management, translator appointment, proofreader appointment, progress control, project coordination, real-time tracking and feedback.
sent.trans: 订单管理、译员分配、译审指定、进度控制、项目协调、实时跟踪和反馈。

sent.orig: This Paper narrates the general appointment, special appointment and its exertion and guarantee.
sent.trans: 本文分别论述了独立董事的一般性职权、特别职权及其职权行使和保障。

sent.orig: Mrs. Beaman has made an appointment with Mr. Stephenson before.
sent.trans: 毕蔓夫人原与斯蒂芬森先生有个约会。

sent.orig: Australian Prime Minister Kevin Rudd, on the appointment of Quentin Bryce, Australia's first female governor general.
sent.trans: 在任命昆廷·布莱斯为澳大利亚首位女总督时，总理陆克文说。

sent.orig: The judges agreed on his unfitness for the appointment.
sent.trans: 评委们就他不适合那项任命的意见达成了一致。
